name: Left Behind (itch) (Rylynn)
description:
Download our game to your mobile phone!(Only Android is currently available)

Tap on the screen to move.

Click on objects to interact.

When comes to the nether world, you can use the joystick on the upper right corner to move the light to solve puzzles.

In the last level, you can grab items in the river to the background to change the plot.
